actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for the establishment of a virtual health pilot program to facilitate utilization of remote patient monitoring technology to maintain or expand access to health care services for individuals in rural areas during the COVID-19 emergency period, and for other purposes.
short_title: Increasing Rural Health Access During the COVID–19 Public Health Emergency Act of 2020
subjects: Emergency medical services and trauma care

titles.title: Increasing Rural Health Access During the COVID–19 Public Health Emergency Act of 2020
Increasing Rural Health Access During the COVID–19 Public Health Emergency Act of 2020

A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for the establishment of a virtual health pilot program to facilitate utilization of remote patient monitoring technology to maintain or expand access to health care services for individuals in rural areas during the COVID-19 emergency period, and for other purposes.
